college_name: R.V. Parankar College of Engineering and Technology, Arvi

civil.about: The Civil Engineering Department offers a full-time undergraduate programme...
civil.mission: To create professionals trained in civil engineering systems...

mechanical.about: The Mechanical Engineering department offers a full-time graduate program...
mechanical.vision: To be recognized globally for outstanding education...
mechanical.mission: To provide quality education and advance the knowledge base...

electrical.about: We have a graduate program in Electrical Engineering...
electrical.vision: To produce Electrical Engineers with dynamic well-rounded personalities...
electrical.mission: To offer good quality education and bridge the gap with industry...

it.about: Welcome to the Department of Information Technology...
it.vision: To be a premier center for Information Technology education...
it.mission: Impart comprehensive education in Technology fundamentals...

computer.about: Welcome to the Department of Computer Science Engineering...
computer.vision: To be recognized as a center of excellence...
computer.mission: Provide quality education in computer science...
